turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I wanted to order some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a venti black and white mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fenty.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have any milk preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a venti black and white mocha, with whole milk and whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What's the closest Starbucks to the.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 1st 1st Street in Sacramento.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: there is a starbucks store at 431 I St, Sacramento.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Yeah, that one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks store at 431 I St.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. your receipt will be sent to you via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: byebye.
